section.title: introduction
section.para: In this document actors are usually people. They are referenced by use cases and explain who the person is who is trying to perform a use case.

section.title: Sales Engineer
section.para: Sales engineers go to sites and sell products.

section.title: Admin
section.para: The admin is the person who is responsible for a service.
The admin is the person who will fix the problem if they can.
The admin is the person who will call for support if they cant fix the problem.

section.title: Operator
section.para: The operator is some one who does simple tasks for the admin.
The operator may do some troubleshooting but will typically pass such tasks to the admin.
The operator will do most routine tasks in cluster management, examples include replacing disks and .

section.title: Sponsor SUSE
section.para: Sponsors are people paying for this development.
SUSE Linux has a storage product and this work is part of making that storage product useful.
